release_text: Спасибо за ваши отзывы! Благодаря вам проект развивается и становится лучше. По любым вопросам пишите нам - hudspeedpro@gmail.com В этом обновлении: - Обновления базы происходят быстрее – у нас улучшенная база и новые сервера! - Долгожданные мобильные засады, теперь вы можете делиться информацией о них с другими водителями (база пополняется) - После запуска громкость регулируется клавишами на самом устройстве. - Доработки в интерфейсе Приятного использования и безопасной езды!

description: GPS АнтиРадар работает как радар-детектор и предупредит Вас о стационарных камерах (камеры контроля скорости) и радарах ДПС на Вашем пути. Если при приближении к камере Ваша скорость будет выше разрешенной более чем на 19 км/ч, то приложение будет подавать предупреждающие звуки. А это важно, т.к. теперь штраф за превышение на >20 км/ч уже начинается с 500 рублей. Карта с камерами в нашей базе - http://map.gpsantiradar.info/ *** Хорошая новость! *** Теперь есть бесплатная версия GPS АнтиРадар. Вы можете оценить и протестировать программу на вашем устройстве и в своем городе абсолютно бесплатно - http://goo.gl/u7Z7AJ Приложение работает с помощью известных данных о расположении стационарных камер и радаров ДПС (такие как Стрелка или Старт СТ) и других объектов. Есть возможность добавить недостающие камеры вручную и синхронизация их между пользователями! Вам не нужно ждать пока мы добавим камеры, она пополняется просто и удобно самими пользователями! Настоящий радар-детектор, конечно, работает надежнее, но и стоит более чем в 100 раз дороже этого приложения. GPS АнтиРадар может работать в фоне, т.е. вы можете использовать его совместно с навигатором. Сообщения о камерах или постах ДПС будут выводиться с помощью голосовых уведомлений. Внимание! GPS АнтиРадар - это ваш помощник, но не гарант отсутствия штрафов, т.к. новые камеры могут не сразу попадать в базу данных. Пожалуйста, соблюдайте правила дорожного движения. В настоящий момент приложение содержит карту камер и радаров для: – России Наша группа ВКонтакте - http://vk.com/public59336195 Официальная страница Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/pages/%D0%90%D0%BD%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%A0%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%80/201419256701196?fref=ts Здесь вы можете оставить свои пожелания, комментарии, информацию о недостающих камерах и т.д. --------------------------------------------------------- Часто задаваемые вопросы: 1. Приложение не может найти GPS сигнал. Что делать? Работа GPS зависит от многих факторов, в том числе погоды. Многие программы, например навигации, используют кроме GPS, GSM триангуляцию по сотовым вышкам (мы ее не используем в виду большой погрешности). – Выйдите на открытое пространство. GPS сигнал не будет найден в квартире или другом закрытом помещении. – Убедитесь, что модуль GPS включен. При включении GPS АнтиРадар в панели событий Android должно появиться системное уведомление о работе GPS. – Попробуйте выключить и заново включить GPS модуль. 2. Отсутствует звуковое оповещение. Что делать? – Убедитесь, что громкость всех типов уведомлений установлена на максимум. Найти эту настройку можно по следующему пути: откройте стандартные настройки Android -> Звук -> Громкость. – Убедитесь, что в GPS АнтиРадар не установлен чекбокс "только скорость". Это позволит воспроизводить звук не нарушая ПДД. – Проверьте работу проехав рядом с камерой. Как только на экране появляется тип камеры и скорость ограничения этой камеры должен прозвучать звуковой сигнал. – При подключении устройства к магнитоле автомобиля с помощью Bluetooth, убедитесь, что другие приложения могу воспроизводить звуковые уведомления. 3. Я раньше использовал бесплатную версию и затем купил Premium, но приложение не изменилось / Я не могу установить Premium версию – Пожалуйста, удалите все предыдущие версии и поставьте еще раз Premium с GooglePlay по ссылке https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.StrelkaSD. 4. Сняли деньги два раза. Почему? – Это особенность работы Google Play, как правило они в тот же день возвращают деньги сами, без дополнительных действий. Наше приложение не занимается какими-либо операциями с деньгами. GPS radar detector works like a radar detector and alert you to the stationary cameras (speed cameras) and radar DPS on your way. If you are approaching the camera, your speed will be higher than allowed by more than 19 km / h, the application will serve warning sounds. And this is important because Now the penalty for excess> 20 km / h already starts from 500 rubles. Map with cameras in our database - http://map.gpsantiradar.info/ *** Good news! *** Now there's a free version of GPS radar detector. You can evaluate and test the program on your device and in your city absolutely free - http://goo.gl/u7Z7AJ The application works with the known data on the location of fixed cameras and radar DPS (such as arrows or Start PT) and other objects. It is possible to add the missing camera and manually synchronize them between users! You do not need to wait until we add the camera, it is easy and convenient updated by the users themselves! This radar detector, of course, works reliably, but it also costs more than 100 times the price of this app. GPS radar detector can work in the background, ie, you can use it in conjunction with the navigator. Posts about cameras or traffic police posts will be displayed with voice notifications. Warning! GPS radar detector - this is your assistant, but not warranted to be free of fines, because New cameras can not immediately get into the database. Please observe the rules of the road. At the moment, the application contains a map of cameras and radars for: - Russia Our group VKontakte - http://vk.com/public59336195 Official page of Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/pages/%D0%90%D0%BD%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%A0%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%80/201419256701196?fref=ts Here you can leave your suggestions, comments, information about the missing camera, etc. -------------------------------------------------- ------- FAQ: 1. An application can not find a GPS signal. What to do? Work GPS depends on many factors, including weather. Many programs, such as navigation, use other than GPS, GSM triangulation on cell towers (we do not use it in view of the large error). - Get out into the open. GPS signal can not be found in an apartment or other enclosed area. - Ensure that the GPS module is switched on. When the GPS radar detector in the event of the Android system notification should appear on GPS. - Try to disable and re-enable the GPS. 2. There is no audible alarm. What to do? - Ensure that the volume of all types of notifications is set to maximum. Find this can be in the following location: Open the default settings Android -> Sound -> Volume. - Make sure that the GPS radar detector is not installed checkbox "only the speed." You can then play the sound without breaking the traffic rules. - Check the operation after passing next to the camera. As soon as the display shows the type of camera and speed limit of the camera you will hear a beep. - When connecting the device to the radio car using Bluetooth, make sure that other applications can play sound notifications.   3. I have previously used the free version, and then bought a Premium, but the application has not changed / I can not install the Premium version - Please remove all previous versions and put more time with Premium GooglePlay link https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.StrelkaSD. 4. They took the money twice. How Come? - This is a feature of Google Play, as a rule they are in the same day, the money will return, without further action. Our application is not engaged in any transactions with money.
release_text: Друзья, мы получили много писем про звуковую нотификацию при старте приложения. Это обновление убирает стандартный звуковой сигнал при старте, теперь он не будет мешать вам ночью :) Также мы поправили несколько ошибок, которые могли происходить при синхронизации объектов добавленных пользователями. Спасибо, за ваши отзывы и поддержку!

description: Ключевые функции: - GPS АнтиРадар работает как радар-детектор и предупреждает Вас о стационарных камерах и радарах ДПС на Вашем пути. - Еженедельные бесплатные обновления базы! - Приложение не содержит рекламы! - Удобный, простой и полностью русифицированный интерфейс. - Работа в бекграунде. Можно запускать Яндекс или Гугл карты, навигацию или любые другие программы, которые Вы хотите. О приближении к камере сообщат приятным женским голосом. - База покрывает все регионы России. - Незаменимый помощник в пути! Если при приближении к камере ваша скорость будет выше разрешенной более чем на 19 км/ч, то приложение будет подавать предупреждающие звуки. А это важно, т.к. теперь штраф за превышение на >20 км/ч уже начинается с 500 рублей. Карта с камерами в нашей базе - http://map.gpsantiradar.info/ Приложение работает с помощью известных данных о расположении стационарных камер и радаров ДПС (такие как Стрелка или Старт СТ) и других объектов. В PREMIUM версии есть возможность добавить недостающие камеры вручную и синхронизация их между пользователями! Вам не нужно ждать пока мы добавим камеры, она пополняется просто и удобно самими пользователями! Наша группа ВКонтакте - http://vk.com/public59336195 Официальная страница Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/pages/%D0%90%D0%BD%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%A0%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%80/201419256701196?fref=ts Здесь вы можете оставить свои пожелания, комментарии, информацию о недостающих камерах и т.д. Внимание! GPS АнтиРадар - это ваш помощник, но не гарант отсутствия штрафов, т.к. новые камеры могут не сразу попадать в базу данных. Пожалуйста, соблюдайте правила дорожного движения. Настоящий радар-детектор, конечно, работает надежнее, но это приложение бесплатно! --- Часто задаваемые вопросы: 1. Приложение не может найти GPS сигнал. Что делать? Работа GPS зависит от многих факторов, в том числе погоды. Многие программы, например навигации, используют кроме GPS, GSM триангуляцию по сотовым вышкам (мы ее не используем в виду большой погрешности). - Выйдите на открытое пространство. GPS сигнал не будет найден в квартире или другом закрытом помещении. - Убедитесь, что модуль GPS включен. При включении GPS АнтиРадар в панели событий Android должно появиться системное уведомление о работе GPS. - Попробуйте выключить и заново включить GPS модуль. 2. Отсутствует звуковое оповещение. Что делать? - Убедитесь, что громкость всех типов уведомлений установлена на максимум. Найти эту настройку можно по следующему пути: откройте стандартные настройки Android -> Звук -> Громкость. - Убедитесь, что в GPS АнтиРадар не установлен чекбокс "только скорость". Это позволит воспроизводить звук не нарушая ПДД. - Проверьте работу проехав рядом с камерой. Как только на экране появляется тип камеры и скорость ограничения этой камеры должен прозвучать звуковой сигнал. - При подключении устройства к магнитоле автомобиля с помощью Bluetooth, убедитесь, что другие приложения могу воспроизводить звуковые уведомления. Key features: - GPS radar detector works like a radar detector and warns you of fixed cameras and radar DPS on your way. - Weekly free database updates! - The application contains no advertising! - Convenient, easy and completely Russified interface. - Work in bekgraunda. You can run Yandex or Google maps, navigation or any other programs that you want. On approaching the camera will report a pleasant female voice. - Database covers all regions of Russia. - An indispensable tool in the way! If you are approaching the camera, your speed will be higher than allowed by more than 19 km / h, the application will serve warning sounds. And this is important because Now the penalty for excess> 20 km / h already starts from 500 rubles. Map with cameras in our database - http://map.gpsantiradar.info/ The application works with the known data on the location of fixed cameras and radar DPS (such as arrows or Start PT) and other objects. In the PREMIUM version is possible to add the missing camera and manually synchronize them between users! You do not need to wait until we add the camera, it is easy and convenient updated by the users themselves! Our group VKontakte - http://vk.com/public59336195 Official page of Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/pages/%D0%90%D0%BD%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%A0%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%80/201419256701196?fref=ts Here you can leave your suggestions, comments, information about the missing camera, etc. Warning! GPS radar detector - this is your assistant, but not warranted to be free of fines, because New cameras can not immediately get into the database. Please observe the rules of the road. This radar detector, of course, works reliably, but this app is free! --- FAQ: 1. An application can not find a GPS signal. What to do? Work GPS depends on many factors, including weather. Many programs, such as navigation, use other than GPS, GSM triangulation on cell towers (we do not use it in view of the large error). - Get out into the open. GPS signal can not be found in an apartment or other enclosed area. - Ensure that the GPS module is switched on. When the GPS radar detector in the event of the Android system notification should appear on GPS. - Try to disable and re-enable the GPS. 2. There is no audible alarm. What to do? - Ensure that the volume of all types of notifications is set to maximum. Find this can be in the following location: Open the default settings Android -> Sound -> Volume. - Make sure that the GPS radar detector is not installed checkbox "only the speed." You can then play the sound without breaking the traffic rules. - Check the operation after passing next to the camera. As soon as the display shows the type of camera and speed limit of the camera you will hear a beep. - When connecting the device to the radio car using Bluetooth, make sure that other applications can play sound notifications.

"Even with the vast prevalence of army games, you’ve never seen one quite like this. Any fan of arcade titles will want to check out." - Egotastic The acclaimed retro shoot 'em-up has found its natural home on mobile devices! Its unique concept challenges 2 soldiers to catch enemies in their cross-fire without hitting each other. Whether playing in a team or as an individual, simply touch either side of the screen to fire that gun. Touch either side of the rope to position the bomb (or tilt the device), before tapping the bomb itself to score multiple kills! There are 10 different types of enemy to encounter, spread across 10 unique battlefields - including unarmed hostages that you must rescue. Play through all 10 missions and win medals for your hi scores. * Requires a device compatible with Adobe AIR.

>> The french video game finally translated for Android ! [Adventure game - Polar interactive U.S. / Guaranteed virus free and without advertising / complete set without additional payment] >> SYNOPSIS After stopping a mafia kingpin, Frederic Hunter, a police officer must hide in the village of his childhood, in France ... But upon his arrival, he discovers the body of a young girl, Laura, at the edge of the river. The adventure begins: examine the body of the victim, browse the village, ask its inhabitants ... and try to discover what happened to poor Laura: suicide, accident or murder? ... Throughout the investigation, the adventure takes a turn most mysterious. What are those lights in the forest ? Why Laura's body appears to have unknown radiations ? What is DRM (French military intelligence services) to the village? Is this the Mafia will find Frederic Hunter ? ... Many puzzles that you must solve in order to understand what is happening in this strange village ... >> RECOMMENDATIONS The game is an interactive detective story ... Without violent content may be likely to shock an audience young or sensitive. It is strictly note recommended for children (-18 years). >> IMPORTANT The game contains a lot of multimedia content (400 MB). In order not to overload the shelf low capacity, the game does not install background images, music and videos. It downloads directly on a server without ever storing. The game weighs no more than 27Mb on card (and 250 ko on ROM). Each image must make less than a second to appear [between 0.75 and instantly dry under normal conditions]. The first images can be longer (a few seconds), but everything falls into place slowly ... The images and their load are optimized. The music and sound effects are pre-loaded from the start of the game. As for the video, it is charged streaming (live).

UNO - "Șeptică Americană" is an American card game which can be played from a young age. Is a board game, easy to play with very simple rules, developing the capacity for attention, strategy of player and last but not least, very fun to play RULES OF PLAY: - each player must discard the same color or number with card which is down - draw the top card of the deck if dont have card who matching in color or number - if the player discard the card number 2 next player in sequence draws two cards and loses a turn - if the player discard the card number 7 then himself declares next color to be matched - if the player discard the card number 11 next player in sequence loses a turn - if the entire deck is used during play then the game finish at parity - wins who remains without card Have fun! :)

So you can play against a human player only as a guest. The "Host Player" generates a number that you have to enter in the text field in order to make the connection. To be a "Host Player" must download the version UNO PRO.

description: Jogging program run and walk with a chrono helping you with the steps. do 5 km, 10 km, 1/2 marathon or a marathon training. No publicity and all training programs available. Jogging or running is a popular form of physical activity. Regular running builds strong bones, improves cardiovascular fitness and helps to maintain a healthy weight. The difference between running and jogging is intensity, but both are forms of aerobic exercise.
release_text: Version 1.05 Clock ajustment Version 1.01 Clock ajustment

description: Create and share plays. Visit Sportsdood.com: - Training / How-to videos - Web-based animation viewer - Download Free Windows Video Maker sample: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=152ONnfy_WM&feature=youtu.be Ultimate Dood is a must have application for ultimate coaches. A great clipboard or playbook application, it allows users to touch and move players around on a court and then layer on doodles and text. Once happy with the image, users can then save image. Saving a series of player positions can also be used to make animations that can be shared and imported on other users devices. Can be used on phone or tablet, buy once! Paid features - no ads - save more than 5 plays - animation sharing (can still view someone's shared animation in the free version) Features: - quick play area transitions or use multitouch to position rink - move players, add pylons, refs and a ball - save/share images & animations - add text and move it around - various doodles such as arrow line or dotted line Please email me for support or feature requests: info@sportsdood.com
release_text: - export formation / play databases so you can easily move entire playbooks between devices (tap clipboard icon) - double tap draw main icon to toggle ability to draw and move (also in options) - support custom backgrounds, put images in sdcard/ultimate dood/backgrounds (recommend 500w x 700h or higher same ratio) - ability to delete any frame (press '-' on the frame to remove) - ability to overwrite plays and formations (ex. open a play and save it over the previous version)

description: ============================ This is not group chatting. MULTI KAKAO TALK. ============================ #This app using kakaotalk 1. Write a message and push the [send] button 2. you can send message to several people at the same time 3. Also you can send a picture/video using [+]button

Access the world's largest online auction of firearms and accessories on your mobile device. Buyers can search for items, run saved searches, place items on your watch list in order to find the perfect item to buy. You can also search for the perfect item by scanning the UPC code or entering your favorite seller's username. Then once bid or buy an item you can connect with the seller and find an FFL to handle the transfer. Sellers can track items they are selling, see which ones have bids, monitor item sales, and connect with buyers. You can also update payment, FFL, and shipping statuses of items you've sold. Notifications keep all users up to date on the latest happenings. Whether you are buying or selling the GunBroker.com apps for Android Phones and Android Tablets will make sure you never miss out while you are on the go! Feature Highlights: – Browse / Search: Access powerful search tools including searching by the seller's username – Bid / Buy: Shop GunBroker.com using a mobile optimized interface – Notifications: Buyers - never miss out on an auction when you set up custom alerts. Sellers – find out when you your item sells. – FFL Finder: Find an FFL by zip code or device location. – My GunBroker Buyers - Manage your buying activity at a glance. Sellers – watch your items sell while on the go. Download the GunBroker.com app now to start bidding wherever and whenever! What's New: – My GunBroker Selling interface – Advanced Search by UPC and Seller Name – Notifications on your device to monitor your sales – Immediately Contact the Buyer of your Item

Do you like customizing your guns? Are you wondering what parts would look good on your real steal or airsoft gun. With Gun Maker 2 you can build the gun of your dreams! Gun Maker 2 lets you decide everything. You pick every part. Flip it, scale it, rotate it, color it, do whatever you want! If you can think it, you can build it! This gun builder app is truly customizable. Don’t be fooled by other gun builder apps that limit you. Gun Maker 2 is the ONLY gun building app you will ever need! -Endless combinations of parts -Build your gun from scratch or select one of the pre-built guns to add on to -285+ parts to choose from -Color system lets you easily choose from millions of colors -Group selection lets you move multiple pieces at once -Share your designs with your friends in text messages, emails, or on Facebook and Twitter Go to the Gun Maker Facebook page to share your guns and talk to other gun builders! www.facebook.com/GunMakerApp Follow Gun Maker on Twitter! @GunMakerApp Look for frequent updates to add more parts and features! Gun Maker 2 is brought to you by Evike!

For years, the elves lived peacefully secluded from all other races in the vast forests. But it seems that their peace will be over soon. Hordes of orcs have been seen near the habitat of the elves. Young archer Liliana among other scouts ambushed not to let the commandos of orcs to get to the elven kingdom.

If you are tired of working days in the city, then this game is for you! After all, with it you can enjoy the atmosphere of outdoor recreation - to sit on the beach with a fishing rod. And also to catch fish as much as you want. Here the main thing - patience, if you pull the fish too early, it will float away. However, if you wait to long you can stay without a worm, and no fish.

If you are tired of working days in the city, then this game is for you! After all, with it you can enjoy the atmosphere of outdoor recreation - to sit on the beach with a fishing rod. And also to catch fish as much as you want. Here the main thing - patience, if you pull the fish too early, it will float away. However, if you wait to long you can stay without a worm, and no fish. No ADS!

Help the little sea fish collect caviar. The sea is full of dangers, and you are the only one who can overcome them all! Install the game and set sail for some adventures to the very bottom of the sea. You will have to maneuver between the bright seaweed in search of caviar. Just watch out – there is a lot of other fish around which aim to eat you! To escape from them, look for the mask – it will make you invisible for a few seconds. Catch a heart when you are about to run out of lives. And don't forget to keep an eye on the time - every second counts here. Each star you find will give you acceleration, and the watch will reset the timer. Lily Fish won't cope without you – install the game right now and you will never regret!

Help the little sea fish collect coins to buy out its friends captured by the marine villain. The sea is full of dangers, and you are the only one who can overcome them all! Install the game "Lily’s Journey" and set sail for some adventures to the very bottom of the sea. You will have to maneuver between the bright seaweed in search of gold. Just watch out – there is a lot of other fish around which aim to eat you! To escape from them, look for the mask – it will make you invisible for a few seconds. Catch a heart when you are about to run out of lives. And don't forget to keep an eye on the time - every second counts here. Each star you find will give you acceleration, and the watch will reset the timer. Lily Fish won't cope without you – install the game right now and you will never regret! No ads!

Game for children and adults. Getting tired at the end of the day , funny and naughty frog Clyde peacefully asleep on the lily . Imagine his surprise when he was taken with a current away from home! And here begins his adventure ! When traveling in unfamiliar places , frog is jumping from lily to lily in search of the road home. With each next level the travel becomes more difficult to overcome the obstacles! The way is blocked by the evil fishes tending to push him into the water. When the flow is too fast, he jumps on a board for Serfing, collecting coins, not to return home empty- handed. Jumping , surfing and collect coins ... the adventure is just beginning! Bright cartoon graphics will help you to plunge into the world of maritime adventure of the little frog .

'London is Red'. Game is dedicated to Gunners (Arsenal FC fans). In the game the fans of the opposing team by North London derby turned into zombies and the player's goal is to destroy as much as possible chicken-zombies. At your disposal automatic rifle and a lot of zombies around. In order to replenish ammo, collect boxes of ammunition. Alone you must to defend the honor of your team and destroy the enemy, because that your team is the best!

Little Princess decided to decorate his castle, but luxuries are not cheap. So she goes for a walk to gather some mushrooms and flowers for sale. But there waiting for her little monsters, that and strive to bite the princess. Be careful - Do not fall into the hands of them! Earning enough money you can return home. There you can make a castle, which dreams of a princess. Languages: -English; -Russian; -Ukrainian; -Belarusian.

This game - the continuation of a series of games about fishing. This time you have to go fishing in the rivers. But not all so simple. To fishing was successful, you have to improve the fishing tackle. Fishing rod, reel, lure - all you need you can buy at the store. But that's not all. In order to get to hard to reach places you need to buy the appropriate transport, otherwise you will not go far by your bicycle. The process of catching a little harder, now you need to closely monitor the float, relying on your eyes and vibration. If you feel that the fish begins to bite, do not drag the bait immediately, and slowly pull the float to shore, otherwise you can just scare off the fish. Good luck fishing! Language: English, Russian.

app_name: Speech to text / Voice to text
description: Sensation! Throw out your keyboard and forget about buttons on your smartphone! Our app will record everything you say! Stop wasting time for routine typing. Using a speech synthesis system the app transforms human voice into text, which can be saved and sent via e-mail. Now you can create texts in your device very fast, using only your voice. The convenient app will be useful for different specialists – copywriters, writers, translators, businessmen etc. The program can be used during conversation with a client or a partner when you need shorthand, when you need to rapidly create a text, for people with disabilities etc. Advantages of the Speech to text messenger: • Recognizes texts automatically, no need to transcribe them manually; • High accuracy of recognition; • Convenient and simple interface, special knowledge is not required to work with the app; • Created text can be sent as SMS or via e-mail; • Multi-language feature—several languages are built into the app, so you can dictate text not only in Russian, but also in English, German, French, Italian and so on. To do so you have to choose the right language in settings. How to work with the app: 1. Download and install the Voice-to-text messenger, and let the app work for you; 2. Choose the “Notes” section – here you can type the text or dictate it into the microphone; 3. After the note text is ready, you can save, delete, or send it via SMS or e-mail. System requirements: Android 2.2 Internet connection Using Google Voice text

Meet Sky Weather,the most beautiful,accurate and soothing app now on Playstore! Sky weather makes a perfect balance of elegant design and unique live wallpaper(of forever looping video animations) with all the important weather info on the go! it changes with day and night and most importantly changes with the weather conditions outside displaying most amazing graphics on home screen! and you know what the interesting part is.....there are a total of 18 weather scenes all in amazing HD resolutions!!! Apart from changing of the weather scenes with the changing weather you can also change the scenes your self in the customisation bar!so much to have!this is what it makes sky weather irresistible to have Go ahead and elevate your mood with sky weather which takes the user experience to a whole new level and place yourselves at the cloud level for the hushed real time weather tableau that puts the webs goofy sunshine-rain-cloud icons to shame! +Features+ Amazing weather animation videos(not moving images like other apps) Over 2.5 million locations covered around the world apart from automatic current location finder(GPS Support) Wind and Temperature with all the terms and ranges-max,minimum & today's average! Extreme customisation so that you can experience your favorite weather scene(from the 18) any time on your home screen!
release_text: -Version 2.4 +Fixed Force closes from crash reports +Battery drain issue fixed +Fixed issues occurring on lollipop devices-Fix of Error 505 -Version 2.3 +minor bug fixes +weather update fixed with 30min added +BRAND NEW INTERFACE WITH NEW THEMES AND ALL BUGS FIXED AS PROMISED! +Freeze problem fixed! +GPS toggle(to ON/OFF GPS to save battery) +GPS problem fixed! +Battery saver mode option added in the settings(stop animation after user defined interval)

description: The long-awaited meeting with other civilizations turned to humanity is not so, as humans was calculated . The aliens were not guests, they were invaders who tried to colonize the planet. Mankind had no other choice but to enter the conflict . The war was not long in coming. Aliens , realizing that humans will not give up , they decided to break the morale of the enemy and began to bomb civilian towns . You have to defend the civilian population and to resist alien spacecraft , leading the bombing of the largest cities .
The game in every scene you will get to the finish, the road which runs through the obstacles. Use the physical properties of some objects, to pave the way.

Relieve our planet of ferocious monsters! The whole world is in peril and needs you and your experience to save it from the terrible enemy. Crazy cool 3-d graphics shall send your heart racing. You will not be able to put the game aside, not for a minute! Are you ready for the bloody fight? Mutants are waiting! On February 15th, 2013 a meteorite hit the Earth near Chelyabinsk with devastating outcome. The radiation brought to life the “Z-Sector” – home for all kinds of zombies and other monsters. They hunt people and eat them alive or turn into similar monsters. The contamination spreads so fast, that soon the whole Earth will be invaded. You’ve been sent by the Army to purge the contaminated sector. In order to keep low profile and not to induce panic among civilians your mission is called “Invasion-Z”. You have no idea what awaits you on the spot: living dead, egg-headed lizards, multi-tooth spider and other monsters produced by the radiation are ready to devour you alive. The situation is further complicated by dense fog and tall grass, inhabited by predatory creatures ready to eat or sting you, Fifteen levels lay ahead of you and each of them will greet you with new undead monsters. Try to become a marksman – one miss and your blood and monsters’ saliva will flood the screen. You’ll fight the nasty corpses and other monsters with really existing weapons – Army’s living classics. Use rugged guns, rifles and grenades to secure the “Z-Sector”. The ammo can be acquired while exterminating the mutants. Colorful and full of action graphics and quality effects shall make the dangerous trip an exciting pastime. Real zombies and monsters try to catch you behind of the screen of your device! Download the game “Invasion-Z” to your device now and enjoy the bloody fight with the monsters!

No Ads! You have 100 Golds! Relieve our planet of bloodthirsty monsters! The whole world is in peril and needs you and your experience to save it from the terrible enemy. Wicked 3D graphics shall send your heart racing. You will not be able to put the game aside, not for a minute! Are you ready for the bloody fight? Mutants are waiting! On February 15th, 2013 a meteorite hit the Earth near Chelyabinsk with devastating outcome. The radiation brought to life the “Z-Sector” – home for all kinds of zombies and other monsters. They hunt people and eat them alive or turn into similar monsters. The contamination spreads so fast, that soon the whole Earth will be invaded. You’ve been sent by the Army to mop up the contaminated sector. In order to keep low profile and not to sow panic among civilians your mission is called “Invasion-Z”. You have no idea what awaits you on the spot: living dead, egg-headed lizards, multi-tooth spider and other monsters produced by the radiation are ready to devour you alive. The situation is further complicated by dense fog and tall grass, inhabited by predatory creatures ready to eat or sting you. Fifteen levels lay ahead of you and each of them will greet you with new undead monsters. Try to become a marksman – one miss and your blood and monsters’ saliva will flood the screen. You’ll fight the nasty corpses and other monsters with real existing weapons – Army’s living classics. Use rugged guns, rifles and grenades to secure the “Z-Sector”. You can buy ammo while exterminating the mutants. Rich animation and high-quality special effects shall make the long and dangerous trip an exciting pastime. Real zombies and monsters try to catch you on that side of your gadget’s screen! Download the game “Invasion-Z” to your device now and enjoy the bloody fight with the monsters! Game specs 1. What is it all about: After meteorite explosion zombie and mutants begin to spawn. Special agent is sent to exterminate them and stop them from invading the Earth 2. Game controls: • Accelerometer – the game can be controlled by turning or tilting the device; • Sensor – touching the left part of the screen you induce movement in the left corner and vice versa. 3. Weapons: 19 different weapon types are available: Beretta & Colt guns, UZI, AK-47 & M-16 automatic rifles, Gauss rifle and other useful combat stuff. 4. Perks: • health points regeneration; • damage induced x 2; • skip 1000 meters etc. 5. Gameplay: The survival game consists of 15 levels. The hero destroys enemies, and earns money for each kill. This money can buy him weapons, perks and lots of other stuff. Each level requires more effective protection than the previous one. 6. Enemies: Walking dead of all sorts and other ferocious mutants.

Dancing of northern lights in skies at night Just tap on screen for getting various types and colors in the aurora; APP ICON NAY NOT APPEAR IN SOME DEVICES TO DECRESE RAM consumption This wallpaper gives you a pleasant experience with all northern lights appearing in dark sky. there are also tiny attractive shooting stars in the night sky Hope you enjoy:)

app_name: 【グノシー】マンガも読める、エンタメアプリ
description: TV CM実施中!!3月5日からグノシーに【ジャンプ+】 チャンネルが登場！ グノシーからるろうに剣心などジャンプの厳選作品が毎日1作品、無料で読めます。 ◆雑談のネタをまとめ読み◆ 「エンタメ」「スポーツ」「コラム」「まとめ」「社会」「経済」など、幅広い分野の旬のトピックがまとめて読める。スマホの無料定番ニュース アプリ グノシー 【800万インストール突破!!】 ジャンプ+は右下に表示されている【チャンネルボタン】をクリックし、 グノシー少年ジャンプ+ のチャンネルをフォローしてください。 ※その後もチャンネルページで閲覧可能です。 【グノシーの特徴】 ★朝と夕方に必見のニュースをお届け ★速報ニュースが飛んでくる ★話題は、エンタメ/スポーツ/コラム/時事ネタなど幅広い情報をカバー 【主な使われ方】 ・エンタメ・スポーツ・グルメ・社会・経済などのまとめトピックをチェック ・独自のアルゴリズムであなたの興味にあった話題をお届け ・朝の通勤時間や夜寝る前、空いている時間でグノシーでニュースをチェックしましょう 【グノシーはこんな方におすすめ】 ・すべてのニュースに目を通す時間が無い方 ・ニュースを検索するのが面倒だと思う方 ・毎日、ニュースを効率的に収集したい方 ・あなたにあった、ブログ、ニュースを見つけたい方 ・市場、社説からの面白記事や速報ニュース ・自分のソーシャルメディアを解析した結果から、どんな記事が推薦、キュレーションされるか体験したい方 ・RSS reader(リーダー)が処理しきれない方 ・スマートにニュースを収集したい方 …その他あらゆる記事からニュースをお届けしております！ *普通の記事アプリじゃハブられてしまうような面白記事もでてきます。 *2chで出てくるようなニュース記事やビジネス・就活・天気についての情報も！ ちなみに読み方は、ぐのしー、です。 グノジー、ではありません。 スペルは、gunosyです。gunocyではありません。 ■■Gunosyがすごい3つの理由■■ ①独自のアルゴリズム Gunosyは登録頂いたアカウントを、独自のアルゴリズムにより、解析し、あなたの興味にあった最新のニュースを、お届けします。 お気に入りの記事やニュースは、Twitter、facebookでシェアすることも可能です。 ②使うほど賢く Gunosyはあなたがどの記事やニュースを見ているかを学習し、アルゴリズムを改善して行きます。 Gunosyを使えば使うほど、Gunosyはより賢く、あなたのための記事を推薦するようになります。 ③時間を指定によりプッシュ通知でお知らせ　 時間の指定を行うことで、毎日一定の時間にお知らせを受け取ることも可能です。 決まった時間に、数ある記事やニュースからあなたが読むべき情報をお届けし、アプリからチェック。 ※圏外の場合、遅れて受信する可能性がございます。 それでは、Gunosyで新しいニュース生活を始めましょう!
release_text: 【従来バージョンをご利用の皆様へ】 更新の際に位置情報の許諾が増えておりますが、現在位置を利用した天気予報表示の際に必要です。 また、アプリを起動した際に「Google Play 開発者サービスの更新」を求められることがあります。これはアプリが利用していたアンドロイドの機能が非推奨になったために新たに必要になったものです。なにとぞ、ご理解いただけますようお願い申し上げます。 Ver 4.3.3 (3/30) ・一部のユーザーの方で時間になっても通知が表示されないバグを修正しました Ver 4.3.2 (3/12) ・起動時のパフォーマンスを大幅に改善しました ・設定画面を改善しました Ver 4.2.28 (3/4) ・通知が指定した時間にこないことがある問題を修正しました Ver 4.2.27 (2/16) ・新しい広告を追加しました ・いくつかの不具合を修正しました Ver 4.2.26 (1/19) ・軽微なクラッシュを修正しました Ver 4.2.25 (12/29) ・一部の端末において、動画を含む記事でクラッシュしている問題を修正しました

description: View the world with the tap of your fingers. Looking for the latest hypes and trends? Gunosy covers a wide range of news that may interest you; everything from mellow Entertainment to solid Political news. You don’t even have remind yourself to read the news, our push notifications will do that for you. Gunosy finds its news from multiple web sources, and presents them according to how hot the topic is. You’ll find news you want, whether you’re bored or busy! Start and end your day with Gunosy! Features ・Categorized tabs that you can reorganize to bring relevant news closer to you. ・Customize the categories you need to follow to create your own personal magazine ・Instant access to a wide variety of news: Entertainment, Lifestyle, Economics, and more. ・Push Notifications to remind you of news updates. Need any help? Have a suggestion in mind? Email us at info+global@gunsoy.com
release_text: Ver 1.1.0 (25 June 2014) - Allowed to change the country to show the news for - Cache a part of the articles Ver 1.0.2 (23 May 2014) - Fixed sharing an article with Facebook did not work properly Ver 1.0.1 (21 May 2014) - Fixed some minor defects

description: *뉴스브런치는 이런분들께 추천합니다. 1. 뉴스어플 한개쯤은 설치하신 분. 2. 신문기사보다는 사설 및 칼럼에 관심 많은 분. 3. 논술이나 면접을 대비해야 하는 학생. 4. 다양한 관점의 사설과 칼럼을 한번에 보고 싶은 분. * 뉴스브런치의 특징 1. 뉴스브런치는 다른 뉴스어플과는 다르게 사설과 칼럼만을 전문으로 다룹니다. 2. 조선일보, 중앙일보, 동아일보, 한겨례, 경향신문 등 5개 신문사의 사설과 칼럼을 다룹니다. 3. 보수와 진보에 치우치지 않는 다양한 견해를 App 하나로 얻어가실 수 있습니다. 4. Air Commander is a very addictive line drawing game,you are the commander of air traffic. It is your job to keep aircraft landing safely, more aircraft landed, more levels you achieved. Features: - Simple design and play easily. - 4 great airfields , include Green field/ Snow field / Desert field / Ocean field. - 11 different aircraft , including planes, helicopters and military jets. - Reward achievements for your best try. - Challenge your friends and world by online leaderboards. BW Run is a new jump and run arcade game. Black runner can run on the white road only, and white runner can run on the black road only too. How to play 1.Tap left of screen change the runner color. 2.Tap right off screen to start jump. 3.Black runner can run on the white road only. 4.White runner can run on the black road only. 5.Run as long as you can. Feature: 1.A lot of challenge mode . 2.Simple control mode. 3.Test your brain and hand. 4.Awesone game sound effects. 5.Leaderboards in friends circle and world. Programs for the Handloader! A simple internal ballistics calculator for IMR powders, a "Savings Per Hour" Reloading calculator for rifle, pistol and shotgun, a bullet stability calculator (Miller), and a standard deviation charter. You can save and load all your work.

Save time and money as you zero in your rifle in 4 shots with GunSim Rifle Zero Ballistics. The app simply tells you how many clicks to adjust your scope, based on your initial group. Left and Right, Up and Down are clear, no need to guess! The GunSim ballistics engine lets you zero your rifle for 200 yards with the target at 25 yards (or any other distances), so you can see the holes, again saving time and money. You can save your numbers for later, to remind you what your zero is. 1/2 Moa, 1/4 Moa, 1/8 Moa, 1/10 Mil, USA/Metric all included. G1/G7 BC values.
Simple short-cut to start the hiden Gallery application on Xperia X10.

description: Guobi Arabic Keyboard ( الوحة المفاتيح العربية ) Features: ◇ Guobi Keyboard supports smart input for over 50 languages. ◇ With multiple keyboard designs for each language, you may choose the keyboard which suits you best. ◇ With its smart-learning features, your favourite words, phrases, sentences and other typing habits will be learnt when you type. ◇ Auto word correction intelligently covers you when you mistype. ◇ For fast entry of symbols or numbers, just press on the letter keys and slide upwards. ◇ Keyboard height adjusts automatically to your screen. ◇ No personal information, such as passwords, credit card numbers and other privacy information will be learnt. The keyboard contains Arabic and English input modes only. If you need other languages, please search and install its keyboard individually. Please be awared that some of the languages are paid keyboards. Please be sure that Arabic font can be shown in your device. Here are the keyboard layouts available:Normal, Normal(R2L), Extended and Extended(R2L). VERY IMPORTANT! To enable the keyboard, go to "Language and keyboard" settings, and check "Guobi Keyboard" box. Then: - on Android < 3.0: long press in any text input area until a popup menu appears, select "Input Method" in this menu, and choose "Guobi Keyboard" in the list. - on Android > 3.0: pull the status bar while the keyboard is visible, and choose "Select Input Method", then "Guobi Keyboard" Languages available: Afrikaans Albanian -- Shqipe Arabic -- اللغة العربية Bangla -- বাংলা Basque -- Euskara Belarusian -- Беларускі Bulgarian -- български Catalan -- Català Danish -- Dansk Dutch -- Netherlands Estonian -- Eesti keel Farsi -- فارسی Filipino -- Tagalog Finnish -- Suomi French -- Français German -- Deutsch Greek -- Ελληνικά Hausa Hebrew -- עברית Hindi -- मानक हिन्दी Hinglish Hungarian -- Magyar Icelandic -- Íslenska Indonesian -- Bahasa Indonesia Irish -- Gaeilge Italian -- Italiano Kannada -- ಕನ್ನಡ Kurdish Kyrgyz -- Кыргыз Malagasy Malay -- Bahasa Melayu Mongolian -- Монгол хэл Nepali -- नेपाली Norwegian -- Norsk Pashto -- پښتو‏ Polish -- Język polski Portuguese Europe -- Português Portuguese South America -- Português Romanian -- Limba română Russian -- Русский язык Slovak -- Slovenčina Slovenian -- Slovenščina Spanish Europe -- Español Spanish South America -- Español Swahili -- Kiswahili Tamil -- தமிழ் Telugu -- తెలుగు Thai -- ภาษาไทย Turkish -- Türkçe Ukrainian -- Українська Uighur -- ئۇيغۇر يېزىقى Urdu -- اُردو‏‎ Uzbek -- U'zbek Vietnamese -- Tiếng Việt Zhuang

description: You're playing as a most wanted criminal in the state(or province). Cops are everywhere searching for this master criminal mind (you) either dead or alive! It's time to eliminate those pesky authorities! About this game in general: • There are 15 levels in this beta: • There are HUD (Heads Up Display) on the top left corner of the screen, watch out for your health (hp) and your ammo (clip). • Classic GameBoy and NES experience. • Checkpoints and level selectors Controls: • Left and right: Movement • A: Jump • B: Shoot • A/B: Shoot in car level Notice, this game is still in BETA phase. Which means it's still in development for further changes for bug fixes, additions, expansions, and more in the near future!! If you find any glitches/bugs or improvements Also available for iOS and Windows Phone!

description: Reach the end of the road without crashing. you need to be careful and patient, but sometimes fast and furious :) - 20 Funny Levels (More Coming Soon) - Realistic Physics - Fun ragdoll while crashing - Stylized black and white art Ride your paper bike!

Rugby Time Killer is a real time killer if you love rugby. Very simple game, touch screen, move finger to aim and kick the ball. Very addictive and fun to waste your time before waiting for something or someone :)

Recipe Pal is he ultimate application for all food lovers. Walking around in a grocery store and not knowing what ingredients to buy, those days are over. With this app you will be carrying your personal cookbook in your pocket. With Recipe Pal you can also create shopping lists and plan your meals & menus. Application features: * Add recipes * Edit / move / delete / rename recipes * Create / delete / rename recipe categories * Add / edit / delete shopping list items * Create shopping lists from the recipes of your choice * E-mail recipes or shopping lists * Dropbox support * Menu Planner (Meal Planner) * Import recipes in cookML and recipeML format * Export recipes in cookML, recipeML and HTML format * Recipe Pal Web Server support. Browse your recipes in a web browser from an other device / PC (press the menu-key). * Support for recipe search and recipe search by ingredient(s) * Changing the number of servings ( yield ) will rescale the recipe ingredients Your feedback is very much appreciated, so please don't hesitate to contact us.
release_text: *Added Tablet support *Updated Theme and small UI tweaks *Word suggestions when typing ingredients *Bug fixes

description: Dots And Lines is a classic pen and paper game. Starting with an empty grid of dots, players take turns, adding a single horizontal or vertical line between two unjoined adjacent dots. A player who completes the fourth side of a 1×1 box earns one point and takes another turn. The game ends when no more lines can be placed. The winner of the game is the player with the most points.

Advance fish in aquarium to next level aquarium by tapping the screen. Make high score by having 3 lives in hand.Google play game services has been added to share your score with your friends. Share your score and achievement with your friends. Compare your score with your friends and public. Challenge your friends to make high scores in this game. Good Luck.

Support a variety of Sudoku The basic form of Sudoku bout seudokuwa provides various types of Sudoku. There are two kinds of games when you start a new grid styles and the five additional areas are offered in various forms, depending on which one you choose, you can play Sudoku. Grid-style Two types of grid styles are available:   - The standard form of a grid of     The grid is divided into 3x3 blocks.   - In the form of a curved grid     In standard form of a grid of nine rectangular blocks are provided. In contrast, the grid in the form of a curved rather than rectangular block 9 is provided. The area of ​​each block are depicted as thick lines are easily distinguishable. Of course, each block of numbers from 1 to 9 must appear only once. Additional areas Sudoku game adds a few rules of the area will be added. There are four types of additional areas:   - None     Sudoku is a basic form. Nine in the form of rectangular or curved blocks are provided. 9 blocks in rows and columns of numbers from 1-9 without duplicates is required.   - X-Sudoku     Diagonal in the number in the range of 1-9 must be entered only once. X-seudokueseoneun diagonal line corresponding to the diagonal cells marked with different colors are easily distinguishable.   - Hyper-Sudoku     Hyper-seudokueseoneun four additional areas will be highlighted. Rows and columns in this area, with each block number in the range of 1-9 should be entered only once.   - Percent - Sudoku     Percent - seudokueneun% (percent) is the appearance of additional areas. Of course, the added area is a number between 1-9 must be entered only once.   - Color - Sudoku     Color - seudokueseoneun nine additional areas are provided. Is added to distinguish each area is highlighted in color and number in the range of 1-9 cells of the same color must not be duplicated. Level of difficulty Sudoku offers a round of five levels. Easy, medium, challenging, difficult, very difficult, so the five levels are available. Seudokuboda bent seudokuneun standard can be viewed generally more difficult. 10 different game types, and five of difficulty, and each type of difficulty per puzzle by providing a total of 100 offers more than 5,000 puzzles that can be seen. When you first select the cells selected cell is highlighted. If you want to delete the selected cell value by pressing the C button. Invert button to reverse the current cell's value is used. If the cell does not work for any number of you are very convenient.   - After selecting a cell, select the number The number pad on the bottom of the screen to select a number from the first touch is the way the cells. The touch cell will enter the selected number.

description: This app delivers five most essential skill games in a single app for parents and teacher to share with kids:- ** ABC Letters and Phonetics in English ** Numbers and Counting ** Shape puzzles ** Colors ** Tracing These games have been developed by professionals with specialization in child development and design. They encourage active participation, early problem solving, pre-academics. And most important - it is Fun ! With over a million downloads on smart phones and tablets devices, the educational games by "GuruCool" are a proven way to boost your child's early learning abilities. They are also the top and best free games for kids in the PLAY store. FEATURES • Multi-sensory approach to learning that will kids engaged for hours- Beautiful music, encouraging sounds, real life pictures and amazing touch experiences • Multiple high-definition pictures to help build vocabulary along with phonetically accurate sounds • Positive reinforcement through sound effects and encouraging voice overs • Clean and simple design makes it child-friendly and appealing • Intuitive progression through steps; children set their own pace HOW DO WE PROMOTE LEARNING? These games were developed with educators and parents and tested on kids. Our collection of learning games are interactive and engaging- there are strikingly beautiful pictures with corresponding names to help build vocabulary. Early literacy skills such as making predictions are also incorporated. To develop visual discrimination, children can match pictures in an appealing puzzle format. We engage fine motor skills and spatial awareness in each activity. We have carefully selected the images, voices, and background music to facilitate the maximum learning potential of your child! These are high quality games that we make with subject matters and a lot of love, They are quality games that would compare well against famous reading, math, english, drawing, learning, coloring, abc, kindergarten, autism, special needs apps from brands like Lego, Disney, PBS, Toca Boca, Intellijoy and Dr Panda. CHECK OUT OUR PARENTZONE We know that tablets and apps are just a part of the learning experience. One of the most powerful influences in children’s learning is parents! Therefore, we strive to provide useful information to parents and teachers in the form of strategies and activities. These daily tips can give you ideas on a variety of activities you can do with your child to encourage learning in the form of short readable tips. The link to our website provides more information on these activities and more. From the ParentZone you also have a centralized view of your child’s progress and you can also reset your apps to start from the beginning. We are continuously adding new learning experiences so look to us for fun, entertaining & educational activities to help your kids learn, explore n grow.
release_text: All games can be played for free now with Ads sponsorship

description: This android application stores all your Call History data including incoming, outgoing and missed calls entries. Features: - This app filters incoming ,outgoing and missed(rejected) Calls. - Also provide separate list for incoming, outgoing and missed call when you select any record from the log and it provides the statistics data. - Can hide the contact identity from the settings if you don’t want to show user’s name and photo sometimes. - Show the date, time and duration in the logs. - Display total duration for a selected user in detail screen. - User can send direct Message to the selected contact number from the log. - User can make a direct Call to the selected contact number from the history record. - It is very useful application when you want to record more than 500 logs because default Android app stores only 500 call history data. - You can delete the unwanted data from the application. - It is also providing facility to reset the complete logs

Carteleras de cines en México - Cartelera de Cinépolis, Cartelera de Cinemex, Cartelera de Cineteca Nacional, Cartelera de Film Club Café, Cartelera de CineManía, Cartelera de Autocinema Coyote,Cartelera de CitiCinemas y Cartelera de Xtreme Cinemas - Encuentra cines cerca de tí con GPS. CARACTERISTICAS PRINCIPALES ✔ ¡Es Gratis! ✔ Encuentra y checa la cartelera del cine de tu preferencia con horarios y sinopsis de las películas. ✔ Da click en un horario para comprar boletos en la página oficial de la cadena, o para crear un recordatorio del horario de la película. ✔ Usa el GPS de tu dispositivo para encontrar cines cercanos a tí (hasta 3km en la versión gratuita y hasta 10 en la versión PRO) ✔ Usa el buscador para encontrar películas en cines cercanos (hasta 3km en la versión gratuita y hasta 10 en la versión PRO)* ✔ Guarda complejos en tu lista de favoritos para fácil acceso ✔ Checa la ubicación del cine en el mapa (requiere Google Maps instalado) ✔ Un click para buscar el trailer de la película en Youtube ✔ Fácil de usar y con una interfaz amigable OTRAS CARACTERISTICAS ✔ Carteleras y horarios confiables (la información se extrae directamente de los sitios web de las cadenas de cine) ✔ Bajo consumo de datos (Internet). Si tienes un plan limitado, ¡despreocúpate! ✔ Rápido funcionamiento y ocupa poca memoria ¿NECESITAS MAS? CHECA LA VERSION PRO La versión PRO quita los anuncios, te permite encontrar cines hasta 10km a la redonda con el GPS y ver próximos estrenos en cines seleccionados, así como buscar películas automáticamente en tus favoritos y en cines hasta 10km a la redonda. Puedes comprar PRO desde Cine Mapp o descargar la llave PRO desde aquí: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gururojo.cinemapppro Si necesitas ayuda, reporta tu problema a nuestro correo de contacto (no uses el sistema de comentarios para reportar problemas) ¿Te gustó la App? Califícanos! =) *La función de búsqueda sólo está disponible para dispositivos con Android 3.0 o superior Los logotipos y marcas mencionadas son marcas registradas o marcas comerciales de sus respectivos propietarios en México y/u otros paises. Billboards cinemas in Mexico - Billboard Cinepolis, Cinemex billboard, billboard National Film, Film Club Café billboard, billboard Cinemania, Coyote Autocinema billboard, billboard billboard CitiCinemas and Xtreme Cinemas - Find theaters near you with GPS. FEATURES ✔ It's Free! ✔ Find and Czech cinema Billboard your preference schedules and synopses of films. ✔ Da click on a schedule to purchase tickets on the official website of the chain, or to create a reminder movie schedule. ✔ Use your device's GPS to find theaters near you (up to 3km in the free version and up to 10 in PRO version) ✔ Use the search engine to find movie theaters nearby (up to 3km in the free version and up to 10 in PRO version) * ✔ complex Save in your favorites list for easy access ✔ Czech film location on map (requires Google Maps installed) ✔ One click to search the trailer for the movie on Youtube ✔ Easy to use with friendly interface OTHER FEATURES ✔ Charts and reliable schedules (the information is extracted directly from the websites of cinema chains) ✔ Low consumption data (Internet). If you have a limited plan, not worry! ✔ Fast operation and occupies little memory NEED MORE? CZECH VERSION PRO The PRO version removes the ads, lets you find cinemas to 10km radius with GPS and see upcoming movies in selected cinemas and automatically search your favorite movies and cinemas to 10km radius. You can buy from Cine Mapp PRO or PRO key download from here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gururojo.cinemapppro If you need help, report your problem to our contact email (do not use the commenting system for reporting problems) Do you like the App? description: Your best source for upcoming MMA events, news and fighter information. Not only tracks the UFC events, but Strikeforce, WEC, DREAM, BFC and MFC. View upcoming events with betting lines. View past events with winners and results. Here is a list of other features: - Never forget another upcoming fight with the Add To Calendar feature, simply long-press on an event name. - See past events by scrolling up past the Future Events header in the events listing. - Click the News button at the bottom to switch to the news section, click the Events button to switch back to upcoming and past events. - Offline mode, caches the previously fetched data so you can view fights and news when you have no Internet connection (like on most planes). - Use your phone's menu key to quit the application, ensuring your phone doesn't waste battery or processor power to keep the application alive. Any questions, problems, or suggestions, please email me.
release_text: Fixed the missing fighter pictures and corrected some issues with BFC and MFC fight listings. Also now compatible with Jellybean. NOTE: Any problems or questions, PLEASE EMAIL ME. Posting a problem in the comments will do nothing to get it fixed!

description: Anxious for Christmas to arrive? Miss seeing snow? Looking for a relaxing fire to watch? Maybe you are interested in Christmas trivia? Or, perhaps, you long for a nice selection of Christmas songs? Christmas Countdown has all of those things and more! This app includes: ★ Over 100 tidbits of trivia relating to Christmas. This includes music, movies, books, and religious trivia! ★ Virtual analog wall clock -- great for desktops! ★ Countdown banner with days until Christmas! ★ Virtual fireplace ★ Virtual snow ★ A great selection of Christmas songs to spread Christmas cheer! ★ Touch items on the screen to reveal secret surprises! ...Gee whiz! Is Santa EVER going to arrive??? Permissions explained: - Internet & Access network state: this app is ad-supported and requires Internet access.

*Requirements - An eBook Reader app (We recommend Aldiko Book Reader) or Google Play Books to read .epub files. *Ability to download .epub files into your mobile. *Copy text to clipboard *Zoom In and Out Controls *Ability to play Audio Book with your Built-In music player Over 38,000+ Free Classic eBooks to be downloaded into your Android Devices and Google Play Books. If you can't start the app from your app menu, try restarting your phone. This is a known problem with Market updates on some Andriod phones. If you have any problems with the app, contact us at support@freetop10ebooks.com we'll be happy to help! *All available eBooks in this App belongs to Project Gutenberg. We have no formal affiliation nor represent Project Gutenberg.
release_text: Version 4 * Updated to comply with Google Play Policy

description: Netcaster is a simple and seamless audio podcast manager that was built using latest Ice Cream Sandwich and Jelly Bean API-s. Give it a try if you were a fan of the discontinued Google Listen. Main features: * Always visible media player that provides quick access to the currently playing episode * Automatic playlist management. New episodes are added and old ones removed without any extra effort * Drag and drop reordering in the playlist * Automatic episode downloads with mobile data and power saving options * Search for feeds by keyword or insert feed URL-s directly * Import feeds from OPML file (when opened from file manager/email etc) Permissions explained: * INTERNET - needed to download feeds and files * WAKE_LOCK - needed to continue playback when the screen is turned off * WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - store podcast episodes on SD card * ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE, ACCESS_WIFI_STATE - check network status/type when Wifi-only download is configured
release_text: 1.3.1 Fixed bug on updating feeds where publish date is missing Localization 1.3.0 ETag support for quicker updates Improved feed charset detection

description: The most popular iOS countdown app is now available on Android! Get yours today at 50% off. ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Count down to the occasions that matter to you with style, reminders, and voices with more than 5 million users worldwide! In Dreamdays, you can sort through your countdown events through categories and degrees of importance. You will be able to customize each countdown event with your personal background, record voice memos that reflect your feelings, and share your delight with friends on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram. Main Functions & Highlights: - Supports countdown to events and counting up once they arrive - Six default categories (Anniversary, Birthday, Holiday, Life, School, Trip) and the ability to add new ones - Voice memos to record your thoughts for each event - Set your favorite event as cover with ease and style - Push notifications to remind you of an arriving event - Customizable background for each event - Customizable order of events - PIN protection to keep your privacy - Widgets to keep track of your events directly from the home screen - Share your delight with friends on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram - Working on Android Wear! - Calendar available We are looking forward to your feedback so that we can keep on building on a product that matters to you :)
release_text: - Huge fix! If you feel 2.0 is not good enough, update it!

description: Sequel to popular "C25K Pro", taking you to 10K. There are two plans, use the menu to switch between them. Time your run listening to your own music. Audio signals to switch pace. Background mode, music controller, custom sounds and notifications.
release_text: Female voice cues are now default. Music player runs on more platforms. Appears on more markets. Allows move to SD card. "Turn-around" sounds. Rare crash fixes.

description: NEW: Pro version supports background mode, music control, and custom sounds. --- Using the C25K plan from Couch to 5K? This app times your workout while you listen to your own music or podcasts. It plays an audio signal when you need to switch your pace. This is a fully functioning 9-week plan. There's no upsale after 2 weeks like in the competitor's free version. The only drawback is that it needs to be in the foreground to run. For background mode (and a lot of other cool features), you're invited to upgrade to Pro. --- v 1.2.2 - Fixed notification volume

Pro version of the popular C25K app. Following the Couch to 5K plan, this app times your workout while you listen to your own music. It plays an audio signal when you need to switch your pace. Pro has background mode, music controller, custom sounds and notifications, and facebook integration.
release_text: Female voice cues are now default. New functionality enables more phone models to control music player (including Gingerbread / 2.3). Also changed the licensing to comply with Google's new licensing model and market. This should fix the problem with the app not appearing on some Gingerbread / 2.3 markets. Fixed several rare crashes.

description: This is a simple auto rotate widget. This application is included with my other toggles in my Premium Widget pack available for purchase in one convenient download! **If you are having problems seeing the widget, please try recreating the widget or reinstalling. Necessary code updates may require this action, sorry! This is designed to match my other widgets. This refreshes on a regular interval and when the screen is turned on (unlike other widgets) to stay up to date. Please check out my other applications! This is a widget. Long press on the home screen -> Add Widget -> Auto Rotate Widget. Changelog on website
release_text: 1.6.1: Support Android 4.2 1.6.0: Support new paid widget pack - You may have to recreate widget. 1.5.0: New HD Widget 1.4.1: Stability improvements. No longer leaves services running. 1.4.0: Fixes layout on ICS phones. Uses a broadcast receiver instead of manual registration for more stability.

description: This package of toggle widgets is a combination and expansion of my previous toggle widgets which have all gotten positive reviews (average of at least 4 stars) - including Airplane Mode, Auto Rotate, Sound Mode, and Wifi On/Off. This package includes all my previous widgets in one easy download, AND includes 3 new widgets: Bluetooth Widget Cell Data Widget (Currently NOT working in Android 5.0 - Thank Google for breaking it). GPS Widget (links to Location settings but shows status - Android security limitation :( ) Wifi Tether Widget (has issues currently on the HTC One and perhaps other phones. This turns on forwarding on the phone if it's allowed.) - This has been tested on the Galaxy S3/S4/Nexus 5. *Android 4.2 does not allow changing airplane mode directly any longer. I will look into changing this with root. This pack helps to support the developer, and also includes an application to show novices how to add widgets and provides contact information for support. Thank you everyone for trying my widgets!

Fixed contact email link in app. 1.0.4: Fixed Wifi widget for Android 4.1.2. No airplane widget message box when adding any more unless on Android 4.2 or greater 1.0.3: Support Android 4.2 fully - fixed multiple widgets 1.0.2: Cleanup wifi widget look. 1.0.1: Support Android Jellybean 4.2 1.0.0: Initial Release

description: DumaSense is a translation dictionary App, developed by Global View with the experience designing both Wenquxing Dictionary and Hot Tech Electronic Dictionaries. DumaSense is suitable for students, office workers, backpackers, every English and Chinese learners. # Abundant online and offline materials > Dictionary, rich in content. User could find US/UK phonetic notation, Chinese definitions, examples, and inflections of the English entry words; entering Chinese character to get English definitions. DumaSense provides English pronunciation, syllable pronunciation, example sentence pronunciation, WordNet Dictionary, 4PixTalk and other abundant content online. User could also download voice database to find pronunciation of high frequency words offline. > Wordlist, convenient cloud backup. As soon as the wordlist was uploaded, user could download, manage, memorize and share wordlists in DumaCard App. > Settings, user-friendly options. User could use language settings to select target language, 中文(繁體), 中文(简体), English(繁體), English(简体), to choose simplified Chinese, traditional Chinese, or English interface. > More, multiple applications. Providing links to startup diverse applications. # Authoritative and authentic language learning > Word Pronunciation, authentic and accurate. Pronunciation is recorded by specialists, which is authentic and natural. > Authoritative Syllable Pronunciation. Words are divided into several syllables that user could pronounce a word naturally. # Experience no boundaries in applications > WordNet, beyond your imagination. Based on word sense, WordNet Dictionary provides precise English definition, concise Chinese translation, abundant examples, synonyms and antonyms. > Classical Exam Examples. Data in Exam examples are from several entrance examinations, such as Basic Competence Test, General Scholastic Ability Test, Advanced Subjects Test, and TVE Joint College Entrance Examination databases over the years, which is a significant reference for senior high and college entrance examinations. # Fun, creative and informative > 4PixTalk, original photo strips and contexts. To give user a deeper impression while learning, 4PixTalk contains pictures, along with both Chinese and English examples that would go with the word user is searching for. Without matching word, 4PixPopup would randomly select for users. 远见科技以设计文曲星、哈电族电子字典的经验, 开发的翻译辞典App, 适合学生、上班族、背包客及各阶层学习中英文人士者使用。 # 崭新离线在线, 内容无限. > 超丰富的内容在[词典]. 输入英文可查美式英式音标、中文释义、例句、词性变化等; 输入中文则可查询英文释义。连网时提供英文单词发音、单词音节发音及例句发音, 以及词网词典、四图插话等丰富线上内容; 可下载离线语音库, 在离线状态下查询常用单词发音。 > 超方便的云端备份在[单词本]. 单词本上传后, 可自DumaCard APP下载、管理、背诵、分享。 > 超人性化的选项在[设置]. 可设置语言, 中文(繁体), 中文(简体), English(繁体), English(简体), 适合简、繁及英文介面使用者。 > 超多元的应用在[更多]. 在更多里导入实用功能, 开启其他连结, 实现更多元的应用。 # 革新权威道地, 学习无双. > 超道地的英语在[单词发音]. 所有发音皆为专家录制真人发音, 语调道地自然, 如同原音重现。 > 超权威的音节在[音节发音]. 音节发音是将英文单词划分音节, 用户只看英文单词也会自然发音。 # 一新应用探索, 体验无垠. > 超想象的释义在[词网词典]. 词网词典依单词词性, 提供精确的英文释义、精简的中文解释、丰富的例句与同反义词。 > 超经典的实例在[考题例句]. 考题例句基于历年的基测、学测、指考、统测试题资料库, 极具高中、大学入学考试指标性的参考价值。 # 创新诙谐知性, 乐趣无穷. > 超精采的例文在[四图插话]. 四图插话依查询单词给予包括行脚、心情、知性、创作、说笑、缤纷等类型之中英双语四图例文, 加深英文学习印象; 四图随选则是在无符合的单词时, 为用户随机选取一套图文, 增加学习乐趣。
release_text: Ver.1.7.1 Solved problems when searching words under Simplified Chinese language mode. Ver.1.7.0 .Fixed bugs in Download Wordlist, Download Voice Database, and Language settings. * This software can only be used in combination with the desktop software GW-Base 8 or higher* GW-Mobil® Quality Assurance and Improvement in the Efficiency of Groundwater Data Acquisition in the Field GW-Mobil is a software solution for the acquisition of groundwater data in the field, equipped with a set of quality assurance tools. False readings, the confusion of station names or transcription errors, that can happen to the most experienced personnel, are prevented. After the measurements have been carried out, the data is imported from the mobile device directly into the ground water management system GW-Base® 8.0, which makes the labor-intensive work of formatting data before transferring it into another system unnecessary. Some features of GW-Mobil: • maps, photos and basic station data that are stored on the mobile device help to located and identify stations • all stations can be alternatively displayed on Google Maps™ • already during data input in the field the completeness and plausibility of the data is checked • tools for planning and managing routes lead to an increase in efficiency • data can be directly transferred from the mobile device to the GW-Base® database, which saves time and eliminates type errors • by using barcode scans, mistaken station identities are no longer possible • With the help of GPS and Google Maps™ you can directly navigate you to the stations - Please send a Mail with your Device ID to info@ribeka.com to register your GW-Mobil-Version (Get Device ID in the GW-Mobil App via Registration-Button) GW-Mobile is only utlilizable in combination with GW-Base.

Welcome to Barron’s Essential GRE Words, featuring high-frequency vocabulary words you should know for the test! - Based on our best-selling book, this app will help you master the words you need to know to succeed on the verbal section of the GRE. - This free starter application includes 30 “essential” words most commonly seen on the exam as well as 5 unique exam questions to test your word knowledge. - The flash card format gives you a quick and efficient way to study the words you don’t know and file away the words you do. Each flash card contains the vocabulary word on the front, and its part of speech, definition, and sample sentence/s on the back. - Flash cards can be filed into either the “Mastered” box or the “Unknown" and ” Known" boxes for future vocab review. - An interactive quiz allows you to choose your test size and review answers immediately or when you complete the exam. Need a more intensive GRE review? Then download the complete set of clickable word lists and flash cards for both the 300 most essential words and the 800 high-frequency words by making an in-app purchase of $4.99. -For more Barron’s GRE-related test prep materials, visit us at www.barronseduc.com.
release_text: Fixed blurry text issue on flashcards caused by hardware accelerated graphics.

description: The ACT® Test Prep For Dummies App gets you ready for one of the biggest tests of your high school years. And, the more practice you have, the better you’ll score. This app features more than 150 practice questions covering critical reading, writing, and math skills. You’ll also get two full length practice exams covering every section of the test WITH time limits – just like on test day. Our proven tips are designed to make test preparation and test day just a bit easier. Regardless of your academic strengths or weaknesses, this App gets you test-ready. App Features Study Questions EVERY type of question you’ll see on test day, including English, Mathematics, Reading, and Science Reasoning. You’ll know instantly if you got a question right or wrong and WHY. Test Yourself Two, full-length, timed practice tests give you a feel for what to expect on the test. The practice tests cover all four sections of the ACT and automatic scoring at the end of each section tells you your percentage score for that section. The ability to mark and then review only marked questions, gives you practice on what you need the most. And you can review all the answers at the end of each section or just the ones where you got the answer wrong. Test Tips We’ve created an extensive list of tips designed to make your test day as successful as possible – from when to skip questions and what to double-check to ways to get and stay calm throughout. Extras Plenty of extra features get you test ready with real-world examples and applications. You’ll get: · How and when to sign up for the ACT · A preview of the ACT and what to expect on test day · Taking the ACT under special conditions (learning disabilities) · Deciding Whether to repeat the ACT · Plus, a “Days Until the Test” countdown clock to help you focus and prepare. ACT® is the registered trademark of ACT, Inc. gWhiz has no affiliation with ACT, Inc., and ACT® Test Practice For Dummies is not approved or endorsed by ACT, Inc.

Want to ace the ASVAB? With this app, everything you need to know is right in the palm of your hand. Based on the bestselling ASVAB For Dummies, Premier PLUS text, you’ll find nine customizable practice tests for each test topic including those that make up the AFQT (Word Knowledge, Paragraph Comprehension, Arithmetic Reasoning and Mathematics Knowledge). · Communication: Word Knowledge and Paragraph Comprehension · Arithmetic: Reasoning and Skills · Technical Skills: General Science, Auto & Shop, Mechanical Comprehension, Electronics, and Assembling Objects The tests, comprised of over 750 highly relevant questions, provide useful review of the latest material with proficiency exercises and tips to help you pinpoint your weaknesses and hone your test taking skills. The app’s analytics allow you to track your overall progress and assess your strength by topic, providing valuable feedback for personalizing your study plan. Whether you are entering the Army, Navy, Air Force, Marines or Coast Guard, the best way to ensure success on exam day is to practice. With the ASVAB Practice for Dummies app in your study kit, you can be sure that you are reviewing the right material, at the pace you choose. So if joining the military is your dream, we can help you achieve it. Have a question or would like to share your feedback, please send us an email at: dummies@gwhizmobile.com

description: Studying on the go has never been this easy! Long recognized as the best free flashcard app on the market, gFlash+ offers users a robust platform for creating, downloading, and manipulating flashcards in every subject under the sun. With this latest release, users not only have access to the gWhiz Catalog on their Android device but can utilize Google Docs to create and store card sets. These new features combined with its innovative implementation of the Leitner learning method make gFlash+ an indispensable learning tool for students of all ages. Free Features: · No limits on the number of flash cards or card sets · Fast Google Docs integration - create your cards in a Google Spreadsheet and then just download into the app · Ability to download from and share card sets with the gWhiz Catalog · 5 star performance scoring - track your improvement! · Multiple choice · Multisided support · Image support · HTML support This new version of gFlash+ also comes with configurable upgrades! Available in-app purchases: · Premium branded content for Essential GRE Words, MCAT, SAT Vocabulary and Math, ACT, CNOR, NCLEX-RN, Nursing, EMT, Real Estate, Architect Registration Examination (ARE), LEED Green Associate (GA), Veterinary Board Exam Review, AP Biology, U.S. History, World History, European History, Microeconomics, Macroeconomics, Psychology, Art History, and more created by leading educational publishers including Kaplan, Barron's, McGraw-Hill, For Dummies, Wiley Publishing, PPI, CCI, FLVS, and Vet Board Games. · Access to over 50 million 3rd party card set sources from Quizlet and StudyStack · Ad removal Here at gWhiz we are committed to customer satisfaction. With over 1 million users of gFlash+, we have received valuable feedback and suggestions for improvement. We have integrated many of these new features in our latest release. So give it a whirl! We're sure you'll agree that gFlash+ is the finest flashcard mobile application on the market today. For more information about our products, please visit our website at www.gwhizmobile.com. If you have comments or suggestions for future improvements, please send an e-mail to info@gwhizmobile.com . You can also find us on Facebook and Twitter.
